# Node见docker网络不通



## K8s配置_搭建各Node节点间的docker网络过程中，部分节点网络无法联通的情况

### 某台 *Node* 节点的 *docker* 可以联通其他 *Node* 节点的 *docker* 网络，其配置如下

```bash
# Generated by iptables-save v1.4.21 on Tue Jul 24 16:36:07 2018
*nat
:PREROUTING ACCEPT [1548:85350]
:INPUT ACCEPT [1548:85350]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [162498:9754225]
:POSTROUTING ACCEPT [162498:9754225]
:DOCKER - [0:0]
-A PREROUTING -m addrtype --dst-type LOCAL -j DOCKER
-A OUTPUT ! -d 127.0.0.0/8 -m addrtype --dst-type LOCAL -j DOCKER
-A POSTROUTING -s 172.17.0.0/16 ! -o docker0 -j MASQUERADE
-A DOCKER -i docker0 -j RETURN
COMMIT
# Completed on Tue Jul 24 16:36:07 2018
# Generated by iptables-save v1.4.21 on Tue Jul 24 16:36:07 2018
*filter
:INPUT ACCEPT [590297:373277140]
:FORWARD DROP [0:0]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [566852:43929396]
:DOCKER - [0:0]
:DOCKER-ISOLATION - [0:0]
-A FORWARD -j DOCKER-ISOLATION
-A FORWARD -o docker0 -j DOCKER
-A FORWARD -o docker0 -m conntrack --ctstate RELATED,ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT
-A FORWARD -i docker0 ! -o docker0 -j ACCEPT
-A FORWARD -i docker0 -o docker0 -j ACCEPT
-A DOCKER-ISOLATION -j RETURN
COMMIT
# Completed on Tue Jul 24 16:36:07 2018
```
